question.questionText: Describe the relationship between the length of the string and the number of swings a swinger makes in 15 seconds.

referenceAnswers.referenceAnswer: The shorter the string is, the more the string swings in 15 seconds. The longer the string is, the less the string swings in 15 seconds.

studentAnswers.studentAnswer: The longer your string is the less amount of swings you will get.
The longer the string the shorter the swings.
Well the longer the string the slower it swings so a 90 centimeters swinger will go very slow compared to a 19 centimeters swinger.
If the string is short it has more swings but if it is long it has less swings.
